Text: Seed please, such a great movie.
This is an amazing movie, I also saw it when I was very young. Whenever you can seed it I will be very thankful!

Hi lightman12
Would you mind to seed? I have already over 50% and I would love to show this movie to my wife and son! Thanx a lot!
Says language (spoken and texted) is English but there are no subtitles and it is spoken in French/German!! Where can I get English subs from pls?
go to www.allsubs.or and search . There are 2 english versions . O picked the second one. Look allright..

The subs are there! you have to watch it with DivXplayer - and select the english subs from there. btw: The movie is in 3 languages, german engish and french and the actors do speak the language they are supposed to speak, e.g. those playing germans speak german etc. very funny. I am lucky, I understand all three so I dont need the subs :-)
